name: Micro Man
description:
This game was made for MiniJam 10 with @Zaphiron.  It took around 10 hours to make and it was our first use of Game Maker Studio 2.  Lot of changes compared to Game Maker 8.1 Lite. Lots.

The theme was "micro" and the limitation was 2 colors by sprite.

The objective of the game is to survive for 1 minute avoiding hitting platforms.  To play you must use the up and down arrows to grow and shrink your size respectively.

While small you will lose 5 health points per second and if micro small the cost will be 10 points per second.  Returning to full size will restore 10 points per second.

Colliding with platforms will take 25 health points.

To play the game download the ZIP file, unpack it and run the executable "microMan.exe".
